name: Wall movement
description:
A short puzzlescript game about walls being 'attached' to cubes and when the cube moves the walls move with it.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=1eafad7c7e294275f307fa5996fda5ef

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=1eafad7c7e294275f307fa5996fda5ef

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
